code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{getTarihteBugun,stateTarihte}from'../../../features/veriler/tarihSlice';export default function TarihteBugun(){var tarihten=useSelector(stateTarihte);var date=new Date();var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){dispatch(getTarihteBugun());},[dispatch]);var months=["Ocak","Şubat","Mart","Nisan","Mayıs","Haziran","Temmuz","Ağustos","Eylül","Ekim","Kasım","Aralık"];return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"card",style:{backgroundColor:"tan",borderRadius:"0.3rem"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"card-body"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",{className:"display-5 text-center",style:{color:"#000066"}},"Takvim Yapra\u011F\u0131 : ",date.getDate()," ",months[date.getMonth()]," "),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",{className:"list-group list-group-flush"},tarihten?tarihten.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{className:"list-group-item",key:item._id,style:{backgroundColor:"inherit"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{style:{fontSize:"0.8rem",color:"black",padding:"0px",margin:"-0.1rem"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("sup",null," * "),item.info," (",item.year,") "));}):null)));}
